name: quality-with-millan
description: VS code extension, with short commands that take you to QualityWithMillan website, where you can read high quality articles on software testing, quality engineering,  development and coding.

commands.title: Quality With Millan : Home Page
commands.description: Open Home Page in default browser

commands.title: Quality With Millan : About
commands.description: Open About Page in default browser

commands.title: Quality With Millan : Posts
commands.description: Open Posts Page in default browser

commands.title: Quality With Millan : Categories
commands.description: Open Categories Page in default browser

commands.title: Quality With Millan : Tags
commands.description: Open Tags Page in default browser

commands.title: Quality With Millan : Tools
commands.description: Open Tools Page in default browser
